name: Fletchling
description: Tiny Robin Pokémon: Its body is always warm. Trainers who live in cold areas apparently sleep with it in their bed.
content: Tiny Robin Pokémon: Its body is always warm. Trainers who live in cold areas apparently sleep with it in their bed.

name: Sentret
description: Scout Pokémon: When Sentret sleeps, it does so while another stands guard. The sentry wakes the others at the first sign of danger. When this Pokémon becomes separated from its pack, it becomes incapable of sleep due to fear.
content: Scout Pokémon: When Sentret sleeps, it does so while another stands guard. The sentry wakes the others at the first sign of danger. When this Pokémon becomes separated from its pack, it becomes incapable of sleep due to fear.
